meanings.definition: Of or relating to the final stage of a religious initiation
meanings.sent1: The telestic ceremony marked the end of their spiritual journey.
meanings.sent2: The priest performed the telestic rituals to signify the completion of the initiation.
meanings.sent3: During the telestic celebration, everyone wore white robes and sang hymns.
meanings.sent4: The telestic moment when the initiate received their sacred symbol was unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The telestic experience left a lasting impact on the participants.

meanings.definition: Capable of achieving a goal or purpose
meanings.sent1: Her telestic determination helped her succeed in her endeavors.
meanings.sent2: The team's telestic efforts led them to victory in the competition.
meanings.sent3: With his telestic mindset, he overcame all obstacles in his path.
meanings.sent4: The telestic nature of her ambition drove her to reach new heights.
meanings.sent5: His telestic attitude inspired others to strive for greatness.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or involving completion or fulfillment
meanings.sent1: The telestic project was finally finished after months of hard work.
meanings.sent2: The painting captured the telestic beauty of the sunset perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The telestic moment when the last piece fell into place was satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The telestic feeling of contentment washed over her as she completed the task.
meanings.sent5: The telestic joy of achieving her dream brought tears to her eyes.
